reviews.author: Akhil Jolly
reviews.body:
I was introduced to this brand by my friend when I was searching for A2 ghee. Bought the hariana cow ghee and when the bottle came, it was just divine. Awesome smell and texture. Then we ordered kangyam cow ghee, gir cow ghee and all ghee‚Äôs are superb. My mother told me that this ghee reminded her of the way it used to be in their young days - same smell, texture and taste. This was the best approval I got and till date have already placed an order of 7 litres of ghee.
There are a lot other ghee in the market but I think this is far more superior and affordable. Plus you have a all time support too where you get all your questions answered.
Thank you Village Company for ending my search for a genuine A2 ghee.

reviews.author: Priyanka Dutta
reviews.body: There are many products available in the market and online who claims to be pure, but most of them are not even close. Buy this and you will not regret.

reviews.author: Arjun Mehta
reviews.body: A2 Ghee was my first order ever of A2 ghee. I know the company makes excellent cold pressed oils, so it was a surprise to find they are also into dairy products. I am pleasantly surprised at the high quality of the ghee. It came in an attractive glass bottle. The texture and flavour was very good both for cooking and taken raw.

This ghee is as good as the pure , natural homemade ghee with all the goodness and aroma. Nice packaging in glass bottle. Worth buying..

reviews.author: Ishika Gupta
reviews.body: I have been using various other brands for cow ghee but those weren't even close to this one in terms of quality, taste and smell. This one seems like the most natural ghee I have tasted. It's very close to the homemade one and definitely very healthy as well. The packaging is great too. It comes in a airtight glass container. Definitely worth trying. I am sure everyone who tries this once will stick to this ghee forever.
